body_html:
My suspicion was correct, you don't have NDK configured, try running ./configure again make sure to configure for Android which will ask you about SDK and NDK. Once you have run configuration correctly your tensorflow/.tfl_configure.bazelrc should contain Android SDK and NDK path.

@hephaex : let me know if that doesn't work.
body_text:
My suspicion was correct, you don't have NDK configured, try running ./configure again make sure to configure for Android which will ask you about SDK and NDK. Once you have run configuration correctly your tensorflow/.tfl_configure.bazelrc should contain Android SDK and NDK path.
@hephaex : let me know if that doesn't work.
body:
My suspicion was correct, you don't have NDK configured, try running ./configure again make sure to configure for Android which will ask you about SDK and NDK. Once you have run configuration correctly your tensorflow/.tfl_configure.bazelrc should contain Android SDK and NDK path.

@hephaex : let me know if that doesn't work.
